PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-23521998-12-210,  ,  LAB,  , 
PrecisAppointment of ROZA ARONOVITCH, of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and order that ROZA ARONOVITCH be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective January 1, 1999.
Attachments
